title: Jenni 'JWoww' Farley calls out Angelina Pivarnick for joking about a threesome with her boyfriend
text:
In new footage from Thursday's episode of Jersey Shore: Family Vacation, Angelina Pivarnick can be seen knocking on the door of Jenni 'JWoww' Farley and her boyfriend, Zack Carpinello, and asking for a threesome.

The coitus request came after Angelina, 33, complained that Zack had been flirting with and touching her inappropriately during a night out. And, after receiving some backlash for the move, Angelina took to Twitter to defend herself, calling the comment 'a joke.'

But on Friday, JWoww, also 33, clapped back at the tweet, writing about how funny her jokes—and her hypocrisy—aren't.

Clap back: On Friday, Jenni 'JWoww' Farley, 33, responded to Angelina's tweet, writing about how funny her jokes—and her hypocrisy—aren't

Drama! In new footage from Thursday's episode of Jersey Shore: Family Vacation, Angelina Pivarnick can be seen knocking on the door of Jenni 'JWoww' Farley, 33, and her boyfriend, Zack Carpinello and asking for a threesome

'Oh ok that makes sense. Glad what you did was a joke, and u grinding on him was a joke... and u kissing him was a joke.. BUT when he joked back, you made it seem like he was a creep and destroyed him in interview. Got it. Makes total sense now,' the Jersey Shore star tweeted in response to Angelina's comment.

In follow up tweets, the reality TV star says she found 'the whole night funny and no big deal,' but didn't like that Angelina spoke about 'how fun the night was (in text) and then [went] in front of a camera and [said] the opposite,' referencing a confessional in which Angelina speaks about Zack's behavior.

The comment that provoked the online response reads: 'when I asked about a three some everyone knew it was a joke. I even knocked on their door and was laughing that scene was after the pool and after the fight him and I had. i never had a three some In my life and I sure as hell wouldn’t want one at 33 years old. #JSFamilyVacation (sic).'

The tweets come after October 10th's episode where viewers watched on as Zack, 24, wrapped his hand around Angelina's waist in a nightclub and touched her behind as a drunk JWoww snoozed nearby.

Trouble: On Thursday's episode, Zack Carpinello, 24, wrapped his hand around Angelina Pivarnick's, 33, waist in a nightclub and touched her behind, as a drunk JWoww snoozed nearby

Angelina had texted JWoww later on, telling her she had had a great time. But during a confessional on Thursday's episode, Angelina placed the blame squarely on Zack, telling viewers about how uncomfortable Zack made her feel.

'So we're all dancing and having a great time. Jenni is obliviated drunk, passed out on her man right now. And all of a sudden, I just feel this big hand just, like, right on me. I was surprised because his hands are so big. It was, like, on my a** and my side. And Jenni's like right there,' she said.

Calling Zack by his age-based nickname, Angelina said: 'We all need to get out of here. Jenni's a f***ing mess right now and 24 is f***ing trouble.'

Looking back: Angelina shared in a confessional that 'all of a sudden, I just feel this big hand just, like, right on me,' describing it has 'on my a** and my side'

'One minute he's asking me about my sex life, and the next minute, he's like grabbing me. He doesn't know what boundaries are,' she added.

The next day, when JWoww got wind of the incident, she refused to believe Angelina's story, snapping at her co-star and saying, 'How much do you commit to a lie?'

But after watching the incident play out on TV, JWoww took to Instagram to share a statement about how 'hurt' she was by it.

Disrespected: JWoww, 33, shared an Instagram statement about how 'hurt' she was by the episode and an Us Weekly insider says she has 'ended the relationship'

'After seeing tonight's episode I'm pretty hurt. I feel disrespected by someone I called a friend and by someone who stated they loved me. For 5 months I was kept in the dark about this. For 5 months I was naïve, probably laughed at and made into a story line that will forever haunt me,' she wrote.

Zack later apologized to JWoww for the indiscretion, writing 'I made mistakes that I cannot take back, which I take full responsibility for,' on his Instagram the following Saturday. 'Jenni does not deserve any damage from anybody else. This is on me. I sincerely apologize to Jenni. I apologize to Angelina as well.'

A Us Weekly insider has said JWoww has since 'ended the relationship.'
description: In new footage from Thursday's episode of Jersey Shore: Family Vacation, Angelina Pivarnick can be seen knocking on JWoww and her beau's door and asking for a threesome.
